title: Falling for Summer
description: Twenty years ago, Amanda Tedlock's life changed forever when her little sister drowned in Lake George, New York. Amanda was only seventeen at the time, but she should have been there that night, and she blames herself for her sister’s death…  Now, on the twentieth anniversary of the drowning, Amanda goes back to Lake George to face her past and unexpectedly meets Summer McBride. Summer is a beautiful, vivacious, carefree woman--everything Amanda isn’t--and Amanda begins to fall for her until she learns Summer’s dark secret. Can love heal all wounds?
author: Bridget Essex
